justification: "1) Thought Disorder: Schizotypal Personality Questionnaire (SPQ); seventy-four items (Raine, 1991)" clearly links the thought-disorder (schizotypy) construct to the SPQ measure.

justification: "2) Somatoform: Othmer and DeSouza Test for Detection of Somatization Disorder; seven items (Othmer and DeSouza, 1985)" specifies the somatoform construct and its questionnaire.

justification: The same sentence notes the STAI is "split by two subscales," identifying the trait subscale as the measure for trait anxiety.
